description: A medium shot captures an art class in a bright room with large windows. A woman, likely an instructor, dressed in a blue jumpsuit, stands next to a young African American man seated at an easel. He is painting an abstract piece with an orange and purple motif on a blue background. The instructor leans in, pointing to his canvas and offering guidance. She then moves away to interact with another student who is partially visible at a separate easel. The young man continues to paint diligently, focused on his artwork.

segments.label: The instructor observes and gives feedback to the young male student who is painting on an easel.
The instructor moves away from the student, who continues to paint, and walks towards another student in the background.
